author: wjmelements
content: you're supposed to create the eip as eip-draft-XXXX.md and only number it once you have a PR number.

author: wjmelements
content:
```
eip-template.md:18:  Note that an EIP number will be assigned by an editor. When opening a pull request to submit your EIP, please use an abbreviated title in the filename, `eip-draft_title_abbrev.md`.
```

author: abcoathup
content: The XXXX threw me, it is the abbreviated title.
